data.name: ResourceFlowDirection
data.comment: Controls the FlowDirection for all elements in the RootFrame. Set to the traditional direction of this resource file's language

data.name: ResourceLanguage
data.comment: Controls the Language and ensures that the font for all elements in the RootFrame aligns with the app's language. Set to the language code of this resource file's language.

data.name: CommonVersion
data.comment: Common text to use when indicating version of game, e.g., version 1.0

data.name: HelpHowToPlayDescription1
data.comment: Help page 2 - description on how to play game

data.name: HelpLines
data.comment: Help page 7 - desciption for changing lines option

data.name: HelpOptions
data.comment: Help pages 7-8 subtitle, these pages focus on the options section of the game

data.name: HelpPads
data.value: 變更進行遊戲的筆記本
data.comment: Help page 7 - description for changing pads option

data.name: HelpRatingsDescription
data.comment: Help page 1 - description for the ratings button

data.name: HelpStartDescription
data.comment: Help page 1 - description for the play game button

data.name: HelpTitle
data.comment: All help pages - help title

data.name: OptionsCredits
data.comment: Options - misc - text for credits button

data.name: OptionsLeaderboards
data.comment: Options - misc - text for leaderboards button

data.name: OptionsLines
data.comment: Options - lines - text for title

data.name: OptionsPads
data.comment: Options - pads - text for title

data.name: OptionsSoundOff
data.comment: Options - misc - text for stating that sound is off.

data.name: OptionsSoundOn
data.comment: Options - misc - text for stating that sound is on.

data.name: OptionsTitle
data.comment: Options - title text for all options pages

data.name: AchievementsLeaderboards
data.comment: Leaderboards screen title.

data.name: AchievementsTopScoresFor
data.comment: Leaderboards screen subtitle.

data.name: CommonCancel
data.comment: Common text to use when we want to cancel an operation.

data.name: CommonDelete
data.comment: Common text to use when we want to delete something.

data.name: CommonError
data.comment: Common text to use when we want to indicate an error.

data.name: CommonNo
data.comment: Common text to use for a no option.

data.name: CommonOK
data.comment: Common text to use for an ok option.

data.name: CommonYes
data.comment: Common text to use for a yes option.

data.name: CreditsCreatedBy
data.comment: Credits screen subtitle.

data.name: CreditsCreatedBySimsip
data.comment: Credits screen company name.

data.name: FinishNewHighScore
data.comment: Finish screen title.

data.name: HudPageLine
data.comment: Hud - status line to be displayed when starting and moving to new page/line, e.g., page/line 1/2 - on first page and moving to second line

data.name: HudResume
data.comment: Hud - text to be displayed under the resume button (toggles with pause button)

data.name: LinesSwitchingLines
data.comment: Options - line selection - status line to display when switching line colors

data.name: PadsSwitchingPads
data.comment: Options - pads - status text to display when switching pads.

data.name: CommonAdmin
data.comment: Ignore

data.name: CommonLater
data.comment: Common text to use when we want to give the user a chance to attempt the operation later.

data.name: CreditsTitle
data.comment: Credits screen title.

data.name: HudHelp
data.comment: Hud - help menu option that will take you to help screens

data.name: HudOptions
data.comment: Hud - options menu option that will take you to options screen

data.name: StartPlay
data.comment: Start - text for play button.

data.name: StartRate
data.comment: Start - text for rate button.

data.name: CommonPage
data.comment: Common text to use when indicating a page number, e.g., page 4.

data.name: HudPause
data.comment: Hud - text to be displayed under pause button

data.name: HudSpeed
data.comment: Hud - text to display under the speed increase/decrease buttons

data.name: HudCannotGoSlowerThan
data.comment: Hud - status line to display when user is attempting to change speed lower than minimum value allowed

data.name: HudPaused
data.comment: Hud - status line to display when you have tapped the pause button

data.name: HudJoystick
data.comment: Hud - text to be displayed in middle of joystick buttons

data.name: HudTrackball
data.comment: Hud - text to display underneath trackball button

data.name: HudTime
data.comment: Hud - text to display above your time for your high score

data.name: HudHome
data.comment: Hud - home menu option that will take you to start screen

data.name: HelpLicense
data.comment: All help pages - tappable subtitle that will take you to game license

data.name: CommonReset
data.value: 在軌跡球上點選兩下以重設畫面
data.comment: Common text to use as a status line to display to users to inform them that they can double tap the trackball icon to reset their view after rotating, scrolling, etc.

data.name: HelpIncreaseDecrease
data.comment: Help page 3 - description for how to change how fast hero moves through game

data.name: HelpOrbit
data.value: 從軌跡球拖曳，以沿著畫面行走
data.comment: Help page 6 - description on how to orbit your view

data.name: HelpPauseResume
data.comment: Help page 3 - description on how to pause or resume hero moving through game

data.name: HelpRotate
data.value: 從中間拖曳可旋轉畫面
data.comment: Help page 4 - description on how to rotate your view

data.name: HelpScroll
data.value: 點選或按住可上下捲動畫面
data.comment: Help page 5 - description on how to scroll your view

data.name: HelpHud
data.comment: Help page 3-6 subtitle, hud is short for heads up display - a gaming term

data.name: HelpLeaderboards
data.comment: Help page 8 - description for leaderboards option

data.name: HelpSound
data.comment: Help page 8 - description for sound option

data.name: UpgradesTitle
data.comment: Upgrades - title for upgrades pages.

data.name: UpgradesPractice
data.comment: Upgrades - practice mode title.

data.name: UpgradesPracticeDesc1
data.comment: Upgrades - first practice mode description line.

data.name: UpgradesPracticeDesc2
data.comment: Upgrades - second practice mode description line.

data.name: HelpUpgrades
data.comment: Help page 9 - upgrades subtitle for page

data.name: HelpUpgradesPractice
data.comment: Help page 9 - upgrade practice mode title

data.name: HelpUpgradesPracticeDesc1
data.comment: Help page 9 - first description line for practice mode

data.name: HelpUpgradesPracticeDesc2
data.comment: Help page 9 - second description for practice mode

data.name: UpgradesBuy
data.comment: Upgrades - text for buy button. Allows user to make an in-app purchase for the upgrade.

data.name: UpgradesPrice
data.comment: Upgrades - text for price. The price of an upgrade will be displayed below this text.

data.name: UpgradesPurchasedOn
data.comment: Upgrades - once an upgrade is purchased this text will display with the date of purchase underneath it.

data.name: UpgradesRestore
data.comment: Upgrades - text for restore button. Restore allows a user to restore a previously purchased in-app product.

data.name: OptionsPracticeKillsOff
data.comment: Options - practice mode - text for stating that kills are off. When kills are off, the hero will not die and cause game restart when he hits an obstacle or line.

data.name: OptionsPracticeKillsOn
data.comment: Options - practice mode - text for stating that kills are on. When kills are on, the hero will die and cause game restart when he hits an obstacle or line.

data.name: OptionsPracticeStartLine
data.comment: Options - practice mode - subtitle text for choosing line you want to start on.

data.name: OptionsPracticeStartPage
data.comment: Options - practice mode - subtitle text for choosing page you want to start on.

data.name: OptionsPracticeSwitchingLine
data.comment: Options - practice mode - status line to display while you are moving to a new starting line.

data.name: OptionsPracticeSwitchingPage
data.comment: Options - practice mode - status line to display while you are moving to a new starting page.

data.name: OptionsPractice
data.comment: Options - practice mode - text for title

data.name: UpgradesPracticeDesc3
data.comment: Upgrades - status line to display once they have purchased practice mode. This tells them how to access practice mode.

data.name: UpgradesPurchaseError
data.comment: Upgrades - text to display if an error occurs when attempting to purchase an upgrade.

data.name: UpgradesPurchaseStatus
data.comment: Upgrades - text to display in popup while purchasing an upgrade.

data.name: UpgradesRestoreError
data.comment: Upgrades - text to display if an error occurs when attempting to restore a purchase.

data.name: UpgradesRestoreStatus
data.comment: Upgrades - text to display in popup will restoring an upgrade.

data.name: AchievementsColumnDate
data.comment: Date column header on leaderboards screen.

data.name: AchievementsColumnTime
data.comment: Time column header on leaderboards screen.

data.name: AchievementsColumnScore
data.comment: Score column header on leaderboards screen.

data.name: HudHigh
data.comment: Hud - text to display above your high score

data.name: HelpSupport
data.comment: All help pages - tappable subtitle that will take you to support page

data.name: FinishWinner
data.comment: Finish screen text to display when user has finished all pages of game.

data.name: MessageBoxMovingToPage
data.comment: Title text for popup box when moving to next page

data.comment: Subtitle text for popup when moving to page 2

data.comment: Subtitle text for popup when moving to page 3

data.name: MessageBoxMovingToPage5
data.comment: Subtitle text for popup when moving to page 5

data.name: MessageBoxMovingToPage6
data.comment: Subtitle text for popup when moving to page 6

data.comment: Common text underneath back arrow on screens.

data.comment: Common text underneath the next arrow on screens.

data.name: CommonPrevious
data.comment: Common text to underneath the previous arrow on screens.

data.name: HelpZoomInOut
data.comment: Help page 3 - description on how to zoom view in or out

data.name: HudSpeedDefault
data.comment: Hud - status line to display when changing speed and you have set yourself to the default speed

data.name: Start3D
data.comment: Start - third portion of game title that is overlayed on top of second portion of game title

data.name: StartLine
data.comment: Start - first portion of game title that is displayed to left of logo.

data.name: StartRunner
data.comment: Start - second portion of game title that is displayed to right of logo.

data.comment: Options - line selection - text for blue color

data.comment: Options - line selection - text for dark green color
